name: Canopic Golem

specialTraits.description: The golem automatically succeeds on saving throws against spells of 7th level or lower, and the attack rolls of such spells always miss it.
specialTraits.name: Limited Spell Immunity

specialTraits.description: The golem doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.
specialTraits.name: Unusual Nature
